title: Boeing 737 MAX crisis: Pilots’ skills, Boeing’s safety standards come under close scrutiny
text:
The crash of Lion Air and Ethiopian Airlines flights shocked the aviation industry and resulted in the grounding of hundreds of Boeing 737 MAX jets worldwide. It may well have been a textbook failure of airmanship by the pilots. Boeing’s safety certifications for the 737 family too may be dated. The crisis highlights the double standards of the West on aviation safety.
